<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rogue Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5092) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 221 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Rogue](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=216)

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity +2

</column>

---

You gain a skill feat and the rogue’s surprise attack class feature (page 167). You become trained in light armor. In addition, you become trained in Stealth or Thievery plus one skill of your choice; if you are already trained in both Stealth and Thievery, you become trained in an additional skill of your choice. You become trained in rogue class DC.

<title level="2">Rogue Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Trickery](/Feats.aspx?ID=5093), [Evasiveness (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=5098), [Skill Mastery (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=5096), [Sneak Attacker](/Feats.aspx?ID=5094), [Uncanny Dodge](/Feats.aspx?ID=5097)
name: Rogue Dedication
